Detailed Description

Class to contain, decompress and draw a JPEG compatible image.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

JpegImage::JpegImage (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using method Init.

JpegImage::JpegImage (  BinData *  data,
BOOLEAN *  success = 0
) 
 

Parameters:
data Pointer to a binary data stream which contains the JPEG data. After passing the binary data stream, the stream is obtained by the JPEG image and hence automatically released in the destructor of the JPEG image.
success Output-parameter, which indicates whether the initialization has been successful.

JpegImage::~JpegImage (   )  [virtual]
 

Releases the binary data stream m_data if it is still obtained and destructs the object.
